meta.title: Uncle1bo Static Website
meta.description: A simple static website built with Bootstrap and deployed on Cloudflare Pages.

hero.title: Under Development
hero.subtitle: Website is under development, stay tuned

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: What makes our static website special

speed.title: Fast Loading
speed.description: Static websites load quickly because they don't require server-side processing.

security.title: Secure
security.description: With no databases or server-side code, static websites have fewer security vulnerabilities.

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: Our templates are designed to look great on all devices, from mobile to desktop.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a team of web developers passionate about creating fast, secure, and beautiful static websites.
about.description: Our mission is to help businesses and individuals establish a strong online presence through well-crafted static websites that are both aesthetically pleasing and technically sound.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers.
contact.description: Email us at info@uncle1bo.com or call us at +1 (234) 567-890.
